{"id":1070613986,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 4 weeks","timestamp":1696824212,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"8 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1070613986/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        int start = 0;\n        int end = s.size()-1;\n\n        while(start<=end){\n\n            //to skip the special character\n            if(!isalnum(s[start])){\n                start++;\n                continue;\n            }\n            //to skip the special character\n            if(!isalnum(s[end])){\n                end--;\n                continue;\n            }\n\n            //If alphabate, check for palindrom\n            if(tolower(s[start]) != tolower(s[end])){\n                return false;\n            }\n            else{\n                start++;\n                end--;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
